item.title: SacredScape
item.dc:creator: @blackflag1 blackflag_
item.description:

11/10/13 Server's loading RS2Server from Hyperion
wth does that mean

item.title: SacredScape
item.dc:creator: @Bells1 Bells
item.description:
@Bells1 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:6, topic:535502”][quote author=Bells link=topic=654311.msg4383388#msg4383388 date=1384352410]

looks very basic at the current stage. I am not sure why you are already delving into skills either when there is so much more to do with the source first. (stability etc)

I’ve actually put a lot of work into this already, stability is good for long-while.
[/quote]Not to play devils advocate babe but…

Started 11/10/13

I’d have to question how stable it really was in the amount of time that would had been. I’d suggest you make a topic and ask what really needs to be looked at/considered before working on regular content cause I can tell you now there are hundreds of things that are wrong. Also, why are you using Hyperion for a PI?[/quote]
i know what needs to be done, i know whats done, and i know what i’m doing.

Read full topic

item.title: SacredScape
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Bells, post:5, topic:535502”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=654311.msg4383144#msg4383144 date=1384273710]
looks very basic at the current stage. I am not sure why you are already delving into skills either when there is so much more to do with the source first. (stability etc)
[/quote]
I’ve actually put a lot of work into this already, stability is good for long-while.[/quote]Not to play devils advocate babe but…

Started 11/10/13

I’d have to question how stable it really was in the amount of time that would had been. I’d suggest you make a topic and ask what really needs to be looked at/considered before working on regular content cause I can tell you now there are hundreds of things that are wrong. Also, why are you using Hyperion for a PI?

Read full topic
